name: SpiritWorks Foundation Wellness Compass and Weekly Action Package
description:
The SpiritWorks Foundation Wellness Compass Package is the complete program utilized by individuals across the country to help them determine the most important direction they can take for their personal wellness and track their success along the way.
 
Developed by Master Recovery Coach Jan Brown the Wellness Compass was designed to support individuals at all phases and stages of personal development and recovery.  It is a tool that promotes wellness through positive self-care.

The package includes the downloadable: 
- Wellness Compass Coversheet 
- Wellness Compass Workbook
- Weekly Action Plan Tutorial

name: SpiritWorks Foundation Goal Setting Package
description:
The SpiritWorks Foundation Goal Setting Package is the program utilized by individuals across the country to help them develop their greatest priorities and set them as IMPACT goals.
 
Master Recovery Coach Jan Brown developed the 16 Things I Want Worksheet, the 16 Slot Goal Sheet and the 4 Working Goals Sheet as part of the goals setting process to support individuals in the creation and prioritization of what matters most. 
 
The package includes the downloadable:
- Four Working Goals Worksheet
- Sixteen Things I Want Worksheet
- Sixteen Slot Goal Sheet
- Goal Setting Tutorial

name: Monster Loyalty: How Lady Gaga Turns Followers into Fanatics
description:
With 23 million albums sold, five Grammy awards, and Forbes’ distinction as one of the world’s most powerful celebrities, it’s no surprise that Lady Gaga is one of the most well-known pop artists in the world. And while known as much for her voice as for her over-the-top wardrobe, few recognize Lady Gaga for her stunning business acumen – which has given her legions of loyal fans worldwide. Fans that are eager to buy her music, her concert tickets, and any and all products related to her. She’s not only created a brand, but is cultivating a fanatical group of consumers that that will follow her for the next two decades of her career and beyond.

In Monster Loyalty: How Lady Gaga Turns Followers into Fanatics, customer loyalty expert and best-selling author, Jackie Huba, argues that Lady Gaga didn’t become the success she is today based solely on her talent. She did so by engendering immense loyalty from her fans – not just through her music – but through the message she inspires and the community she has built around that message. To anyone in the business community, this sounds like a classic case of loyalty marketing and customer cultivation – and it is.

In four short years, Lady Gaga has built an army of passionate fans that numbers in the tens of millions around the globe. Here, Huba explores how she did it, uncovering seven loyalty lessons and providing a playbook for building this kind of loyalty in any organization:

Focus on Your One Percenters – Gaga spends most of her effort on just 1% of her audience, the highly- engaged superfans who drive word of mouth.

Lead with Values – create an emotional connection with customers by showcasing what you believe in

Build Community – connect your most loyal customers with each other to strengthen the bond with you

Give Fans a Name – Gaga calls her fans her “Little Monsters.” A name give customers a way to self-identify as part of the group.

Embrace Shared Symbols –shared symbols helps customers bond by creating a collective experience

Make Them Feel Like Rock Stars – become a fan of your fans and find ways to make them feel special

Generate Something to Talk About – make your business “word-of-mouth-worthy” by continually giving your fans reasons to talk about you

Huba looks at the world through the lens of business and marketing, and believes conventional businesses stand to value tremendously from studying and employing Lady Gaga’s intuitive customer strategies.

With examples from businesses such as MINI, Fiskars, and Maker’s Mark, Monster Loyalty offers a complete case study that can be modeled in companies large and small to build, maintain, and expand the core customer base central to their success.

name: HeadTrip Audio USB Set
description:
The full Head Trip Collection, Head Trip Audio Journal, and pen. Save $21.89 when you buy the full set!

Head Trip Audio magazine is the coaches coach. Are you wondering if you can make it as a coach or entrepreneur? We offer you the practical how-to's utilized by some of the most successful coaches in the world. By listening to this audio program you will hear the tools, tips, and steps they employed to get where they are. It's like having a virtual "leg-up" to help you get on your own road to profitability.  These audio programs are in a word, INSPIRING. If ideas are the currency of the new economy, you'll want to have a monthly thinking partner to help stimulate the creative juices. Head Trip Audio is that partner. This a-zine is packed full of brilliant insights and food for thought designed to jump start your own ideas.

name: Fearless Kisses
description:
How many of us secretly keep a buried, defining piece of ourselves - an unrequited dream, a silent longing, a wish we're too afraid to speak? This book is about unearthing those hidden desires, freeing them to flourish in the air and light of our fearlessness.

With courageous truth-telling, Lyn Christian shares her very human journey to the place that honors her lifelong yearning - to love and partner with a woman. Told with compelling passion, pain, humor, wonder, and insight, Fearless Kisses shows us that when it comes to matters of the heart and soul, we only stand whole when we stand for our own truth. For every reader, this book inspires a brave joy that transforms fear into fearlessness and encourages us to take risks to learn, to love, and to be our truest selves.

Throughout these pages, Christian's lyrical blend of prose and poetry is enhanced by the vibrant, richly-textured art of Jennifer Life. Fearless Kisses is a nourishing feast for the spirit and the eye - one you'll want to devour again and again.

By Lyn Christian.
Illustrated by Jennifer Life.

name: Napping is Necessary Webinar and Workbook Combo
description: Listen in as Lyn Christian founder of SoulSalt, Inc and Amanda Herring, fabric designer for Riley Blake Designs talk about creating a fabric line from thought to finished product.  Learn how one designer puts together a line of fabric and learn some powerful skills to help you accomplish your goals, whatever they may be!

name: Be Strong eBook
description: Be Strong - This ebook will guide you to utilize the information from Stand Out, written by strength expert Marcus Buckingham, as well as from your real-life experiences. The 23 pages which include self-guided exercises assist you to clarify how you can play at peak performance in life and in work.

name: Be True eBook: Personal Integrity
description: Be True - The Be True ebook was designed for you to determine what your Core Value System is. This unique, personal information supports you to be in alignment with what matters most. It assists you in decision making and in living a life of integrity.

name: Be Focus eBook
description: Be Focused - Knowing how to Be Strong and how to Be True will never serve you unless you can manage your focus and do something meaningful with this information. The creative and simple four-step process for being at your most focused version of self is served up effectively in this ebook.

name: Be Strong, Be True, Be Focused eBook set
description:
Receive a lower price when you buy Be Strong, Be True, Be Focused eBook set together.

Be Strong  - This ebook will guide you to utilize the information from Stand Out, written by strength expert Marcus Buckingham, as well as from your real-life experiences. The 23 pages which include self-guided exercises assist you to clarify how you can play at peak performance in life and in work.

Be True - The Be True ebook was designed for you to determine what your Core Value System is. This unique, personal information supports you to be in alignment with what matters most. It assists you in decision making and in living a life of integrity.

Be Focused - Knowing how to Be Strong and how to Be True will never serve you unless you can manage your focus and do something meaningful with this information. The creative and simple four-step process for being at your most focused version of self is served up effectively in this ebook.

name: Be True eBook: Business Integrity
description:
Being True is a concept only the wisest and most aware businesses will adhere to. There are at least two ways that teams can use this ebook:

1) Work through a single book as a team. Take time to meet together, discuss and discover. Use the workbook as an outline of how to walk through a group dialogue.

2) Purchase a copy of this ebook for each team member. Once each individual has recorded their response and they arrive at their top five values, combine the lists. Then, as a team, narrow the sum of everyone’s input down to three or five final company values.

name: G.Y.S.T. eBook
description:
Download this e-book to receive the G.Y.S.T. SoulSalt Workbook
By Lyn T. Christian & Meche’ Ortega

 "Most of us want to get our sh*t together. Few of us know how to do so."
–Lyn Christian founder of SoulSalt Inc.

The GYST (Get-Your-“Stuff”-Together) program is designed to provide structure and support for individuals who want to have a strong, stable base of healthy life-practices – a.k.a. people who want to get “it” together.

This program is best used over a six to twelve month period. In some cases, you may need over a year to truly feel you have your life in a more stable place. That’s perfectly fine as long as you are earnestly moving forward and not dragging your feet or playing small.

name: HeadTrip 1 Download - Create An Exit Strategy
description:
Download Disc: 1
Tracks: 8
Time: 1:08:42

This Edition assits you in applying Stephen R. Covey’s idea of: “beginning with the end in mind.” It will take you through inspiring interviews while teaching you how to carve out your perfect workday. In addition you will learn to create a vision for a perfect week void of needing to work. Creating exit strategies is important for those of us who want to actually end up where we dream of being. Don’t leave your future to chance.

name: HeadTrip 2 Download - Finding Your Hedgehogs
description:
Download Disc: 2
Tracks: 8
Time: 1:12:57

This Head-Trip explores the convergence of three components: strength, passion, and market need. When we discover what we are good at, what we love to do and take that to the market to fulfill a demand, we win. Learn about this methodology from Lyn who has used this approach to support her clients through career reinvention (You will also want to visit the postings under the Hedgehog concept found on http://lynchristian.com/category/hedgehogs/).

name: HeadTrip 3 Download - Re-Think Sales
description:
Download Disc: 3
Tracks: 5
Time: 1:10:03

Most of us are afraid to be considered a snake-oil peddling salesperson. However, selling is part of the core skill set required to succeed in business. This edition leverages the powerful insights of sales guru Blair Singer. You’ll learn to rethink your fear of the sales process and gain tools to make you stronger and more capable of closing important deals. All that and more will be delivered to you and not a drop of snake oil in the batch.

name: HeadTrip 4 Download - How To Create Customer Evangelists
description:
Download Disc: 4
Tracks: 7
Time: 1:07:49

Customer Evangelism is the new theory that drives successful marketing strategies. These six tenets of creating customer evangelists were developed by Ben McConnell and Jackie Hubba in their books. We interview the authors and dig deep into how you can quickly apply each tenet and start driving business your way. The best news of all is that you can do all this without spending a fortune.

name: HeadTrip 5 Download - Business Is A Team Sport Part 1
description:
Download Disc: 5
Tracks: 6
Time: 51:00

HeadTrip 5 is the first download the two part series of Business is a Team Sport. We have taken a deep dive into the dimensions and necessity of creating a success team. You’ll want to make sure that when you are out there competing in the workplace you have the right players in the right places to fully support you. None of us win alone. Download the second part of this two part series, HeadTrip 6, and start assembling your dream team.

name: HeadTrip 6 Download - Business Is A Team Sport Part 2
description:
Download Disc: 6
Tracks: 6
Time: 44:56

HeadTrip 6 is the second download in the two part series of Business is a Team Sport. We have taken a deep dive into the dimensions and necessity of creating a success team. You’ll want to make sure that when you are out there competing in the workplace you have the right players in the right places to fully support you. None of us win alone. Download the first of this two part series, HeadTrip 5, and start assembling your dream team.

name: HeadTrip 7 Download - Never Be Boring
description:
Download Disc: 7
Tracks: 6
Time: 1:07:13

Do you know the five words that will stop people in their tracks? They are “Let me tell you a story” and while much has been written about the importance of telling a good story, less has been documented concerning just how to do this. This edition features author and master storyteller Doug Stevenson as he explains the “how to’s” of telling a great story.

name: HeadTrip 8 Download - This Thing Called Money
description:
Download Disc: 8
Tracks: 6
Time: 1:01:21

Most of us need a tutorial on how to better manage our energy around money. Maria Nemeth Ph.D. offers just that on this edition. You’ll enjoy her wisdom around how to harness and utilize the energy generated by the concept of money. She is sure to raise both your awareness and your earning potential in this powerful interview.

name: HeadTrip 9 Download - The Entrepreneurial Myth
description:
Download Disc: 9
Tracks: 6
Time: 58:06

Michael Gerber really woke us up when he wrote the books The E-Myth and The E-Myth Revisited. Do you have the mindset to start up a business or to own one? Are you too enamored with the doing your work that you are ignoring vital functions of your business? Listen in as we cover a cliff note version of Gerber’s work. It will help you better understand how to split your time between working on the business and working in your business.

name: HeadTrip 10 Download - Project Management
description:
Download Disc: 10
Tracks: 7
Time: 54:26

Every small business has important projects to complete. Many of these projects will determine if you make it as a company or not. This is edition is a good overview of basic project management. Learn from G. Lynne Snead author of To Do, Doing, Done just how simple project management can be.

name: HeadTrip 11  Download - Managing Time And Focus
description:
Download Disc: 11
Tracks: 6
Time: 50:32

Almost every coaching client I encounter needs to improve their time and focus management. This recording delivers foundational principles and strategies that can increase both your effectiveness and satisfaction where time and focus management are concerned. Brush up on how to better manage your time and your focus without having to overhaul your entire planning system.
(Please inquire about the Time Mastery Assessment mentioned in this edition at www.mytimemastery.com)

name: HeadTrip 12 Download - The Perfect Trap
description:
Download Disc: 12
Tracks: 5
Time: 46:50

You might be trapped without even knowing it. Perfectionism is a myth. What’s more, most of us don’t realize the choke-hold it has on us. Did you know that there is something far more powerful and obtainable than perfection? Listen to this program to find out what that is and how to use it to get unstuck and start gaining traction on what matters most to you.
